entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 01:52 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
